subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Steve's Ghost Box and EVP /BYE BYE GB.wav 
  Uploaded by : foreverhaunted57 <foreverhaunted57@...> 
  Description : Hi everyone! This is a sample of the responses that I get on my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. This unit is one of the clearest radios that I have heard. If you can find one. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Steve%27s%20Ghost%20Box%20and%20EVP%20/BYE%20BYE%20GB.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

foreverhaunted57 <foreverhaunted57@...>
